hero.headline: Innovation and Comfort
hero.subheadline: Specialists in evaporative cooling, air conditioning, and heating systems for motorhomes, trucks, and special vehicles. Patented technology for maximum comfort.

about.title: 30 years leading vehicle climatization
about.description: At Neil Climatizadores, we have dedicated over 30 years to designing, manufacturing, and installing evaporative cooling systems for vehicles. We stand out for our innovative «Pre-Cooling System» (Patent AR-031005B1), a unique technological achievement in the Latin American and European markets.
about.description2: Since our beginnings, we have maintained a firm focus with clear goals: Quality, Development, Service, and Commitment. We remain firm in our commitment to the environment, developing products that optimize energy efficiency.

pillars.title: Quality
pillars.desc: The best materials and advanced technology for maximum quality in every product.

pillars.title: Development
pillars.desc: Constantly searching for new technologies to daily improve the quality of our equipment.

pillars.title: Service
pillars.desc: We provide the best customer service with clear answers to every query.

pillars.title: Commitment
pillars.desc: Continuous improvement and permanent commitment to the customer and environment.

about.qualityDesc: Our organization is committed to continuously improving the effectiveness of our system, anticipating potential non-conformities to ensure a higher level of customer satisfaction.
about.mediaSub: Recognized by leaders in the transport and motorhome industry

products.title: Solutions for every need
products.subtitle: Evaporative coolers, air conditioning, heaters, and energy solutions for motorhomes, trucks, and special vehicles.

climatizadores.title: Evaporative Coolers
climatizadores.subtitle: Exclusive Pre-Cooling System
climatizadores.description: Evaporative coolers with the exclusive Pre-Cooling System (Patent AR-031005B1). Ultra-slim, 100% silent, and low power consumption.

aire-acondicionado.title: Air Conditioning
aire-acondicionado.subtitle: Inverter Technology 12V/24V
aire-acondicionado.description: Inverter air conditioners running on 12V and 24V for motorhomes and trucks. High efficiency with low battery consumption.

calderas.title: Diesel Heaters
calderas.subtitle: Efficient heating 12V/24V
calderas.description: High-efficiency diesel heaters for vehicles. 100% silent operation without needing the engine on, and maximum winter comfort.

energia.title: Energy & Solar
energia.subtitle: Portable generators
energia.description: Genki and Bluetti lines of portable solar generators, solar kits, and charging stations. Autonomous energy for your adventures.

accesorios.title: Accessories
accesorios.subtitle: More for your vehicle
accesorios.description: Electric 12V Carjack and TPMS tire pressure monitoring system. Practical solutions for the demanding traveller.

preCooling.title: Pre-Cooling System
preCooling.description: The exclusive Pre-Cooling System, patented by Neil (Patent: AR-031005B1), achieves maximum cooling power while maintaining a fresh and pleasant climate inside the vehicle.
preCooling.description2: Unlike conventional coolers, the Pre-Cooling system activates pre-cooling of the water before distribution, achieving significantly lower temperatures with the same energy consumption.

features.title: Maximum Cooling
features.desc: Temperature up to 8°C lower than conventional systems

features.title: 100% Silent
features.desc: State-of-the-art Brushless pumps, no noise or vibration

features.title: Low Power Draw
features.desc: Superior energy efficiency, extends battery life

features.title: Anti-Spill
features.desc: Sealed system that prevents water spills on curves and braking

europe.title: Neil in Europe
europe.description: Neil coolers are sold throughout Europe for the demanding motorhome market. Their excellent performance, low battery consumption, and unmatched aesthetics make them an ideal companion for motorhome adventures.
europe.description2: We have official dealers in France, Italy, Spain, Portugal, Germany, and the United Kingdom, providing technical support and warranty in each country.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: We are available for technical queries, quotes, and support across all our markets.
